nio/HipChat.Input: Any list of signals. Messages are constructed by evaluating the *HipChat.message* against each signal.

notify.description: Whether or not to notify the occupants of the room when the message arrives.

room_name.description: The plaintext name of the target HipChat room.

message_color.description: The message will appear with this color.

sender.description: The sender name to associate with the message.

nio/HipChat.Description: Block for sending messages to a HipChat room

list_rooms.description: Return a list of the rooms associated with the Auth token provided.

list_users.description: Return a list of the users associated with the Auth token provided.
